de.humatic.dsj.com

Class IAMStreamSelect

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.humatic.dsj.com.COMObject
      • de.humatic.dsj.com.IAMStreamSelect

  • public class IAMStreamSelect
extends COMObject
    Wrapper around the native IAMStreamSelect interface exposed by Microsoft's MPEG splitters and possibly some 3rd party demultiplexers. If exposed this allows for switching between audio and subtitle streams and also returns info on a file's substreams.
    To get an instance of this class, call COMFactory.queryInterface(...) with the filter of interest and COMFactory.IID_IAMStreamSelect as arguments.
    For more information see MSDN documentation.

      • getStreamName

        public java.lang.String getStreamName(int index)
                               throws DSJException
        Returns a string associated with the substream at index. This can be a description of stream characteristics as well as a name in the widest sense of the word depending on how the containing file was authored.
        Throws:
        DSJException
